detail:
Tremendous Victories For TourBox | Successfully launched crowdfunding campaign in Taiwan

May.2020

Tourbox has launched crowdfunding campaign on www.zeczec.com which resulted in 2800 backers and reached NT $10.7 million was raised within 70 days.

TourBox Wins Great Success on Makuake Crowdfunding

Mar.2020

In 60 days' Makuake crowdfunding, TourBox wins great success in the Japanese market and got 2800 backers and 38 million yen crowdfunding amounts.

Meet Us at CES

Jan.2020

TourBox Tech will attend CES 2020 in Las Vegas on 7-10 Jan 2020. Meet us at Booth No. 52823, Sands Expo, Level 1, Hall G EUREKA PARK.

TourBox Launches Crowdfunding on Makuake

Dec.2019

On December 17, 2019, TourBox launched crowdfunding in the Japanese market on Makuake. On the day of launch, it broke 5 million yen. As of January 5, 2020, the crowdfunding amount exceeds 14 million yen.

TourBox Brings Innovative Human-Computer Interaction Solution to HKTDC

Oct.2019

TourBox Tech was invited to participate in Hong Kong Electronics Fair (Autumn Edition) on 14-16 October 2019. During the exhibition, TourBox shared a new generation of human-computer interaction solution.

TourBox Finished Mass Production

Aug.2019

In July 2019, TourBox finished mass production and started the first round shipping. The TourBox Console application was upgraded to 1.1 and received a lot of good reviews from users.

Budding - TourBox Launches Crowdfunding on Kickstarter

Jan.2019

On October 8, 2018, TourBox launched crowdfunding on Kickstarter and got 2000+ backers from 58 countries. The total crowdfunding amount is more than 220,000 USD.
